outline:
1. cement, mortar, clay
    1. mortar, cement
    2. clay
    3. mire
  2. heap
    1. swelling, surging (of water)
  3. homer - a unit of dry measure about 65 imperial gallons (300 l)
strongs_def: properly, a bubbling up, i.e. of water, a wave; of earth, mire or clay (cement); also a heap; hence, a chomer or dry measure
